summary: Alaska® is a leading travel booking platform in the Delta States, offering discounts on flights, hotels, rental cars, vacation packages, and cruises. Known for Express Deals™ and the Name Your Own Price® tool, Alaska® provides savings to millions annually through its 24-hour customer support line. The Alaska® app allows users to access exclusive mobile-only deals and view digital tickets and itineraries easily. The company's Best Price Guarantee offers a refund of the price difference on flights and hotels, and offers a 24 hour claim window. Members of the Alaska® VIP Loyalty Program can also receive exclusive hotel discounts and free hotel upgrades.
shortSummary: Alaska® offers extensive travel discounts, flexibility, and personalized travel benefits, with extensive mobile-only deals and 24-hour customer support.

argos_summary: Alaska is a travel booking platform that offers flights, hotels, car rentals, vacation packages, and cruises, emphasizing Express Deals and a Name Your Own Price tool for savings. It provides 24/7 customer support via a dedicated phone line, an app for mobile-only deals and itinerary management, and a loyalty program called Alaska VIP. The platform guarantees the best price, allows flexible booking changes and cancellations within 24 hours, and offers travel insurance and protection plans. Users can manage bookings, apply promo codes, and access support for issues such as refunds, hotel complaints, and account security through phone or the app.
